text: Your account security requires immediate attention. Please verify your information at: http://secure-update.info/verify
Hi team, the deadline for the project proposal has been extended to next Monday.
FINAL WARNING: Your Google account will be deleted! Confirm here: http://google-support.xyz/confirm
Thanks for your feedback on the quarterly review. I've incorporated your suggestions.
URGENT: Suspicious login detected on your account from Russia. Verify now: http://login-protect.net
The new employee orientation will be held in Conference Room B at 2pm.
Your Chase account has been locked. Restore access immediately: http://chase-verify.info/unlock
Please remember to complete the annual compliance training by end of month.
ACTION REQUIRED: Your email quota exceeded! Upgrade storage: http://mail-storage.xyz/upgrade
Great presentation yesterday! The stakeholders were very pleased with the proposal.
Your Wells Fargo statement is ready. WARNING: Click to view: http://wf-online.net/statement
FYI: The office will close early on Friday for the holiday weekend.
CRITICAL ALERT: Malware detected on your device! Scan now: http://virus-removal.com/clean
Just a reminder that expense reports are due by the 15th of each month.
Confirm your identity to avoid account suspension: http://id-verification.xyz/confirm
The IT department will perform system maintenance this weekend.
Your LinkedIn account has been restricted. Resolve now: http://linkedin-help.net/restore
Looking forward to seeing everyone at the company picnic next Saturday!
SECURITY NOTICE: Your password was changed. If not you: http://password-security.com/recover
The quarterly sales report shows a 15% increase from last year. Great work team!
